insert into five_oa_card_change (business_key, dept_id, dept_name, form_no, change_time, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, is_process_end, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update five_oa_card_change set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, dept_id, dept_name, form_no, change_time, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, is_process_end, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id from five_oa_card_change where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, dept_id, dept_name, form_no, change_time, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, is_process_end, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id from five_oa_card_change
order by id desc
